channel.title: Project Lazarus Java Coder needed
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/mwb0nn.jpg[/img][/center] [size=8pt][center]Resurrecting the past![/center]
[b]Server Informaion click Here>>>[/b] [spoiler][center][img]http://oi61.tinypic.com/mwb0nn.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=14pt][b]Server Links[/b][/size][/center]
[b]FORUMS:[/b] [url=http://projectlazarus.co.uk]projectlazarus.co.uk [/url] [b]CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] [url=http://projectlazarus.co.uk/projectlazarusclient.zip]http://projectlazarus.co.uk/projectlazarusclient.zip [/url]if your computer cant run .jar files try this link
[b]HIGHSCORES:[/b] [url=http://projectlazarus.co.uk/highscoresindex.php]http://projectlazarus.co.uk/highscoresindex.php[/url]
[b]CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK 2 (FOLDER WITH BATCH FILES):[/b] [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/4727292/Project_Lazarus_V1.2.exe.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/4727292/Project_Lazarus_V1.2.exe.html[/url] If you have previously downloaded the client and a connection error has shown up please go to c:users/your user address/revival-rs and delete the folder revival-rs. Then reload this client above and it should work. sorry for this error.
[center][b][size=14pt]Dedicated Server Statistics[/size][/b][/center]
8GB of dedicated RAM.
750GB Hard Disk.
1GB Port (1000mb per second connection).
Windows 2008 Server Operating System.
[center][size=14pt][b]Server Features[/b][/size][/center]
Hello everyone, I though I would post some of the server features for new players to see. so please take a look. If you need and help online please contact my Skype at Mutleyio or online under the username Mutley.
[b]Server rates:[/b] Drop rates - Normal Experience rate - 7x normal rs (14xp on weekends) Client and server version - 317 (2006 and before)
[b]Features[/b]
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/84a9a051_o.png[/img]
First time login screen with character creator. In the inventory you can see starting gear.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/2972d057_o.png[/img]
We currently have a 317 client with appropriate interfaces, as you can see here a 317 character wearing screen.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/a58055b9_o.png[/img]
Random events that teleport the player if they don't interact with them, the player will also be teleport if you get the answer wrong.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/2062190c_o.png[/img]
Over 100 shops that are similar to 2006 rs.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/1de1aa52_o.png[/img]
All skill level up interfaces working.
http://i.share.pho.to/44554141_o.png
All skill menus working.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/a825f1e2_o.png[/img]
All 2006 specials for weapons working. Barrow armour special for wearing full sets also work along with weapon poisoning.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/c9489a70_o.png[/img]
All magic works including modern and ancients.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/fc4baa61_o.jpeg[/img]
All 2006 armour items can be smithed!
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/e238ac79_o.jpeg[/img]
Free to roam server.
[img]http://i.share.pho.to/de9b27ee_o.jpeg[/img]
Runescape 2006 like requirements
There are many many more feature that are not added here. Thanks for reading.
Mutley ~ Project Lazarus Administrator[/spoiler]
[i][b]What I'm looking for[/b][/i]
Hello I'm basically looking for some who is mature and is able to code revival-rs source. The main requirements are as following:
Detailed java knowledge of editing this source. Professional Individual. Must be able to speak and type fluent English.
If you have a passion for rsps and have java experience contact me on Skype under mutleyio.
Please be aware Administrator in project Lazarus cannot trade nor interact with normal players.
Thanks James.

item.title: Project Lazarus Java Coder needed
item.dc:creator: @Enyo Enyo
item.description:
@Enyo wrote:

[center][/center]
[size=8pt][center]Resurrecting the past![/center]

Server Informaion click Here>>> [spoiler][center][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Server Links[/size][/center]

FORUMS: projectlazarus.co.uk

CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK: http://projectlazarus.co.uk/projectlazarusclient.zip
if your computer cant run .jar files try this link

HIGHSCORES: http://projectlazarus.co.uk/highscoresindex.php

CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK 2 (FOLDER WITH BATCH FILES): http://www.upload.ee/files/4727292/Project_Lazarus_V1.2.exe.html
If you have previously downloaded the client and a connection error has shown up please go to c:users/your user address/revival-rs and delete the folder revival-rs. Then reload this client above and it should work. sorry for this error.

[center][size=14pt]Dedicated Server Statistics[/size][/center]

8GB of dedicated RAM.

750GB Hard Disk.

1GB Port (1000mb per second connection).

Windows 2008 Server Operating System.

[center][size=14pt]Server Features[/size][/center]

Hello everyone, I though I would post some of the server features for new players to see. so please take a look. If you need and help online please contact my Skype at Mutleyio or online under the username Mutley.

Server rates:
Drop rates - Normal
Experience rate - 7x normal rs (14xp on weekends)
Client and server version - 317 (2006 and before)

Features

First time login screen with character creator. In the inventory you can see starting gear.

We currently have a 317 client with appropriate interfaces, as you can see here a 317 character wearing screen.

Random events that teleport the player if they don’t interact with them, the player will also be teleport if you get the answer wrong.

Over 100 shops that are similar to 2006 rs.

All skill level up interfaces working.

http://i.share.pho.to/44554141_o.png

All skill menus working.

All 2006 specials for weapons working. Barrow armour special for wearing full sets also work along with weapon poisoning.

All magic works including modern and ancients.

All 2006 armour items can be smithed!

Free to roam server.

Runescape 2006 like requirements

There are many many more feature that are not added here. Thanks for reading.

Mutley ~ Project Lazarus Administrator[/spoiler]

What I’m looking for

Hello I’m basically looking for some who is mature and is able to code revival-rs source. The main requirements are as following:

Detailed java knowledge of editing this source.
Professional Individual.
Must be able to speak and type fluent English.

If you have a passion for rsps and have java experience contact me on Skype under mutleyio.

Please be aware Administrator in project Lazarus cannot trade nor interact with normal players.

Thanks James.

Read full topic
